message_list.content: Hola, bienvenido a Celestar Air. Soy Nova, tu asistente virtual de vuelos. Gracias por llamar. ¿En qué puedo ayudarte hoy?
I want to book a round trip, Premium Economy.

Great—let’s get your round trip in Premium Economy set up. Could you share:
- All trip legs (round trip): origin city/airport, destination, and travel dates for outbound and return
- Preferred departure time windows for each leg (morning/afternoon/evening)

I’ll search top options once I have those details.
DFW to SEA on January 28th, midday, and SEA to DFW on February 11th, early morning.

Thanks. Confirming trip details for a round trip in Premium Economy:
- Outbound: Dallas–Fort Worth (DFW) to Seattle (SEA), January 28, midday
- Return: Seattle (SEA) to Dallas–Fort Worth (DFW), February 11, early morning

Searching flights now—this may take a moment; thanks for your patience.

Here are the top options:
Outbound January 28 (midday preference):
1) Flight CE214, DFW 12:10 → SEA 14:38, nonstop, 3h 28m, Premium Economy
2) Flight CE372, DFW 13:25 → SEA 16:02, nonstop, 3h 37m, Premium Economy
3) Flight CE566, DFW 11:50 → SEA 15:05, 1 stop in DEN, 5h 15m, Premium Economy

Return February 11 (early morning preference):
1) Flight CE205, SEA 06:05 → DFW 12:21, 1 stop in SLC, 4h 16m, Premium Economy
2) Flight CE118, SEA 07:10 → DFW 13:40, 1 stop in PHX, 4h 30m, Premium Economy
3) Flight CE101, SEA 08:00 → DFW 13:20, nonstop, 3h 20m, Premium Economy

Which outbound and return flights would you like to select? I’ll place a temporary hold once you confirm.
I will take CE214 for the outbound and CE101 for the return.

Perfect—CE214 outbound and CE101 return are selected. I’ve placed a temporary hold on those seats for about 15 minutes while we complete your details.

Let’s add traveler information in one go. Please provide:
- Gender
- Date of birth
- Nationality
- Passport number and expiration date (only if traveling internationally)
- First and last name (English characters)
- Known Traveler Number and Redress number (optional)

Once I read it back, we’ll move on to contact info.

I don’t have my passport because it’s not international, but my name is Morgan Smith. Date of birth is July 15, 1985, and nationality is American. I don’t have a Known Traveler Number or Redress number.

Thanks, Morgan. Here’s what I have:
- Name: Morgan Smith
- Gender: not provided
- Date of birth: July 15, 1985
- Nationality: American
- Passport: not required (domestic)
- Known Traveler/Redress: none

Could you please provide your gender as it appears on your ID? After that, I’ll collect your contact info.

Got it—gender: Female.

Please share your contact details:
- Email address (English characters only)
- Mobile phone number with country code
And how would you like notifications—email, SMS, or both?
morgan.smith@inbox.dev, +1 5910163375, and I want notifications by email only.

Thanks, Morgan. I’ve added your contact details and email-only notifications.

Before we finalize, would you like to add anything for this trip—seat selection (standard or extra legroom), checked bags, priority boarding, lounge access, Wi‑Fi, or a special meal?

Absolutely—I’ve added one checked bag to your itinerary.

Here’s your trip:
- Outbound: CE214 DFW 12:10 → SEA 14:38 on Jan 28 (nonstop)
- Return: CE101 SEA 08:00 → DFW 13:20 on Feb 11 (nonstop)

Shall I go ahead and process the payment now? If you prefer to adjust anything, just let me know.
Yes, go ahead and process the payment.

Great—processing your booking now. You’ll be set on CE214 outbound and CE101 return with one checked bag included. If anything looks off, tell me right away.

What payment method would you like to use—credit/debit card, mobile wallet, or a voucher/credit?

Understood. I can take your credit card now. Please enter your card details using the keypad:
- Card number
- Expiration date (MM/YY)
- Cardholder name
- Billing ZIP code
I’ll confirm the total before charging.
